column5: Yet another winter storm is heading for Ontario.  For those in the north, it'll be mostly snow, but for southern Ontario, watch out!  They are saying snow early Thursday turning to several hours of freezing rain for the afternoon rush hour.  Winds are expected to hit up to 70km/h.  For Friday the temps are going to head up to +3 celsius, so snow turning to rain, then back to snow for Saturday.  Not sure what this kind of weather will do to ice for weekend fishing, but I assume it cant help.
High tomorrow is supposed to be 49F and then drop off here. Cold weather and snow for the weekend.
